TopicTitle: The best new lines from science you have found so far?

Articles.Content:
So far my favorite is if you do an EVA from the middle atmosphere in kerbin at about 20,000 meters or so.

"You feel as if you should really get back in the ship"

P.S.

Jeb really is one crazy SOB!

I wonder if there is anything different for when a kerbal is free-falling, not just when the atmosphere is negligible, but at terminal velocity at just 5km or so. Since the kerbal is about to squish, and there is no way to actually send the report...

Soil sample at KSC: "This is the stuff engineers get so angry over when we don't scrub our boots."

(or something similar, can't remember)

'Soil' sample in water: "blah ... Increases humidity of everything it touches"

"I think I can see my House from here."

Went testing in Kerbins water. Something along the Lines.. The Goo escaped. Need to get that quote.
This thread needs a SPOILER tag in the title.

This is my favorite.

Kerbin wasn't even visible at the time.

EVA report on the Mun, I forgot the exact words, but it was something like:

You are about to say something concerning the place of Kerbal-kind in the universe, when mission control interrupts you via the radio.
after a flight i exit from the capsule and it says "Somehow you didnt need a space suit to get here" or something like that =)
Trying to do a material study auround Jool.

My Kerbal was falling towards the mun at like 100m/s from space, and about 1000 meters from impact I did an EVA report and he said :

"This is a precarious situation..."

Kerbin wasn't even visible at the time.

The report doesn't say you actually SAW Kerbin.

The report doesn't say you actually SAW Kerbin.

If you cannot actually see your home world, you would feel VERY small, right... if you could see it.... then the report would have said that you feel very lonely....

My Kerbal was falling towards the mun at like 100m/s from space, and about 1000 meters from impact I did an EVA report and he said :

"This is a precarious situation..."

I get that message whenever I do an Eva report from a telescopic vertical mobility enhancer...a.k.a ladder
Best one for me so far is EVA report on Eeloo. "You lay down and give the planet a hug, just so it knows it's not alone out here."
Ã¢â‚¬Å“The mystery goo feels like homeÃ¢â‚¬Å“ or something when observe at high space of mun. So the goo is from mun?
my favorite comment came from my sample bay above the Mun, it said that the materials were starting to glow from radiation and that it may be fun to paint the ship with it lol

Ã¢â‚¬Å“The mystery goo feels like homeÃ¢â‚¬Å“ or something when observe at high space of mun. So the goo is from mun?

Or it could feel at home in space.... for the Mun to be its home, it would have said that while ON the mun... right?

Or it could feel at home in space.... for the Mun to be its home, it would have said that while ON the mun... right?

Actually, when I took the goo to duna, it said "THe goo has begun glowing red, very much like the planet below"
the goo must somehow take on the properties of its local environment..... we must investigate further...
If you perform a materials study on the surface of Dres the computer will ask to sing the song "daisy bell". Which is in reference to 2001 space odyssey.
Also, never mind the fact my probe is on its side. I meant to do that.

Wow, that's creepy.

I like the one where one of the samples is judging me silently.
I broke it...

http://i.imgur.com/M9MRxBJ.png

Did you just topple that very long rocket?

I don't have the exact quotes, but my favorites so far are Sample collection of water and the launch pad, and material study while on the launch pad.

I haven't gotten to the Mun yet, taking my time with the carreer thing

Edited October 19, 2013 by Sirrobert
